CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(On_Delay_End__c),
(today() - datevalue(On_Delay_Start__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(On_Delay_Start__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(On_Delay_End__c) - datevalue(On_Delay_Start__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(On_Delay_End__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(On_Delay_Start__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: On Delay Case Days Excluding Weekends
